lead_paragraph: A death in Canada was the first known fatality linked to a rupture in an airbag from a supplier other than Takata.

headline.print_headline: Another Airbag Maker Is Under Scrutiny After a Fatal Rupture
headline.main: Another Airbag Maker Is Under Scrutiny After Fatal Rupture

snippet: A death in Canada was the first known fatality linked to a rupture in an airbag from a supplier other than Takata....
abstract: Airbag maker ARC Automotive is being investigated by National Highway Traffic Safety Administration after rupture in one of its bags was connected to July death of driver in Canada.
